src:
KRAJ: Crvena zvezda - Totenhem 0:4
Iz minuta u minut pratite dešavanja sa našeg najvećeg stadiona...

06 Nov 2019


CRVENA ZVEZDA - TOTENHEM 0:4/Lo Selso 34, Son 57, 61, Eriksen 85/


Stadion: 
"
Rajko Mitić", Beograd

Gledalaca: 
42.381

Sudija: 
Karlos del Sero Grande (Španija)

CRVENA ZVEZDA (4-2-3-1): Borjan - Gobeljić (od 46. minuta Žander), Milunović, Degenek, Rodić - Jovančić (od 62. minuta Kanjas), Petrović - Garsija (od 67. minuta Boaći), Marin, Van La Para - Pavkov. Klupa: Popović, Pankov, Vulić, Boaći, Žander, Simić, Kanjas. Trener: Vladan Milojević.TOTENHEM (3-5-2): Gazaniga - Fojt, Sančez, Rouz - Dele Ali (od 62. minuta Eriksen), Ndombele, Dajer, Lo Selso (od 86. minuta Skip), Musa Sisoko - Son (od 75. minuta Sesenjon), Kejn. Klupa: Vorn, Aldervajreld, Sesenjon, Eriksen, Moura, Skip, Dejvis. Trener: Maurisio Poketino.



 
 
Vesti uživo
22:57
POZDRAV DO NAREDNOG VIĐENJA!
To bi bilo sve od nas za večeras, pozivamo vas da pročitate opšrniji izveštaj direktno sa stadiona "Rajko Mitić" od našeg kolege Aleksandra Gligorića.
 
Sa vama je utakmicu ispratio Srđan Todorović, dok su na licu mesta uz Aleksandra Gligorića bili i Darjan Nedeljković i Nenad Jovanović. Želimo vam prijatnu noć, nadamo se da ćete sa nama ostati i u nastavku večeri!
22:55
ZASLUŽENA POBEDA TOTENHEMA!
Dosta prijateljski se rastaju fudbaleri dve ekipe na terenu. Šteta, Zvezda je možda mogla da dođe do nešto boljeg rezultata, ali je u prvom poluvremenu propustila dve zaista velike šanse preko Pavkova i Van La Pare. Totenhem je u drugom poluvremenu ipak pokazao znatno kvalitetniju igru i zasluženo je slavio.
22:54
KRAJ UTAKMICE: CRVENA ZVEZDA - TOTENHEM 0:4
Svira kraj utakmice sudija Del Sero Grande... Ubedljiva pobeda Totenhema u Beogradu!
22:53
NI BOAĆI IZGLEDA NEĆE ZAVRŠITI UTAKMICU
90+4. MINUT: Izašao je Boaći napolje kako bi mu se ukazala pomoć, tako da možda neće ni završiti utakmicu. Sada Zvezda sa samo devet igrača na terenu.
22:50
SKIP DOBIJA ŽUTI KARTON!
90+2. MINUT: Kombinovali su Fojt i Kejn, ali je lopta došla do Borjana. Apsolutno bez uzbuđenja na terenu u poslednjih pet-šest minuta. Sesenjon je sada pokušao da uposli Eriksena u sredini, ali ništa od toga. Evo žutog kartona za Skipa nakon starta nad Boaćijem. Leži na zemlji fudbaler Crvene zvezde... Kao da je sudija sada rekao fudbaleru Totenhema "šta ti je ovo sada trebalo", bar se tako moglo pročitati sa njegovih usana.
22:48
ČETIRI MINUTA NADOKNADE!
90. MINUT: Potpuno se umrtvila igra nakon gola Eriksena. Pitanje je da li će uopšte sudija Del Sero Grande i pokazati koji minut nadoknade... Hoće, četiri minuta!
22:46
POSLEDNJA IZMENA U EKIPI TOTENHEMA!
86. MINUT: Poslednju izmenu pravi Maurisio Poketino, iz igre je izašao Lo Selso, a na teren je istrčao Skip.
22:44
NOVI GOL ZA TOTENHEM! ERIKSEN!
85. MINUT: U strelce se upisao sada i Kristijan Eriksen. Ponovo je to bila lepa akcija Totenhema, Rouz je centrirao po zemlji, Eriksen se našao u srcu kaznenog prostora, šutirao, a lopta se nakon toga odbila od odbranu Crvene zvezde i prevarila Milana Borjana. Ubedljivo vodstvo Sparsa...
22:41
ERIKSEN PRETI...
82. MINUT: Eriksen je uputio udarac ka golu Zvezde, ali je Borjan uspeo da odbrani taj šut! Sada Zvezda preuzima loptu i pokušava maksimalno da spusti ritam, jer ima igrača manje. Međutim, vrlo brzo posed prelazi u noge gostujuće ekipe.
22:39
ZVEZDA SA IGRAČEM MANJE DO KRAJA, PAVKOV SE NEĆE VRATITI NA TEREN!
80. MINUT: Povredio je levi skočni zglob Milan Pavkov i neće nastaviti utakmicu, tako da će Zvezda sa igračem manje odigrati poslednjih deset minuta ove utakmice. Odvezli su Milana Pavkova sa stadiona...
22:35
PAVKOV NA ZEMLJI!
77. MINUT: Nova prilika za Totenhem! Lopta je došla do Đovanija Lo Selsa na ivici kaznenog prostora, a on je šutirao pored desne stative. Zvezda je sada preuzela loptu, pokušava da organizuje napad, ali Pavkov ne dolazi do lopte. Sada je Pavkov na zemlji, problem je što Milojević nema više izmena.
22:34
IZLAZI SON IZ IGRE!
75. MINUT: Pravi izmenu i Maurisio Poketino. Iz igre izlazi Son, a u igri je Sesenjon.
22:31
OKO 42.000 LJUDI NA UTAKMICI!
73. MINUT: Suprotno prognozama, u Beogradu je ponovo počela da pada kiša, tako da je teren sada još više raskvašen. Zvanično, utakmici prisustvuje 42.381 ljudi.
22:30
OPASNO, KEJN!
71. MINUT: Uf, ponovo dobra šansa za Totenhem. Eriksen je centrirao po zemlji sa desne strane terena, a Kejn je šutirao malo pored stative. Mogli su gosti vrlo lako i do četvrtog gola na ovoj utakmici...
22:26
IZMENA - BOAĆI ULAZI, GARSIJA IZLAZI!
67. MINUT: Faul nad Marinom na ivici kaznenog prostora i sudija pokazuje da će to biti slobodan udarac sa leve strane. Marin šutira ka golu, biće korner. Izmena, ušao je Boaći, izašao je Garsija.
22:24
ŽUTI KARTON ZA NJEGOŠA PETROVIĆA!
65. MINUT: Oštar start Petrovića nad Rouzom i sudija Del Sero pokazuje opravdano žuti karton.
22:21
IZMENE NA OBE STRANE!
62. MINUT: Potvrđen je gol... A potom izmene na obe strane. Kod Totenhema igru je napustio Ali, a ušao je Eriksen. U ekipi Zvezde izlazi Jovančić, a ulazi Kanjas.
22:19
NOVI GOL! SON!
61. MINUT: Korner za Zvezdu, drugi na utakmici, ne donosi ništa. Nesigurno deluje Petrović na drugoj strani terena, ali srećom lopta nekako dolazi do Borjana. I onda novi gol... Odlična akcija Totenhema, Rouz je probio po levoj strani terena, centrirao po zemlji, lopta je došla do Sona koji je samo ubacio loptu u mrežu! Čeka se ipak odluka VAR-a...
22:15
GOL! SON!
58. MINUT: Pavkov je izgubio loptu na sredini terena i kazna je stigla na drugoj strani... Dele Ali je dodao loptu do Sona, Zvezda nije ranije uspela da napravi faul i zaustavi akciju, a fudbaler iz Južne Koreje je bukvalno probušio mrežu crveno-belih snažnim udarcem.
22:13
SPARSI POKUŠAVAJU DA SPUSTE RITAM...
55. MINUT: Marin i Garsija su kombinovali, ali iz te prilike se nije izrodilo ništa. Sada Totenhem pokušava da spusti ritam utakmice, kombinovanjem u zadnjoj liniji. 
22:10
RASPLAMSALA SE BORBA!
52. MINUT: Energično ulazi Zvezda u ovo drugo poluvreme, ali na drugoj strani odlična šansa za Totenhem. Dele Ali se nekako probio, gotovo sam izbio pred Borjana, ali je odbrana Zvezde izbacila loptu u korner. Lo Selso centrira iz ugla, boksuje Borjan i Zvezda bar na kratko otklanja opasnost.
22:07
NESPORAZUM PAVKOVA I GARSIJE!
49. MINUT: Pokušao je Kejn da se probije kroz odbranu domaće ekipe, pao je, ali sudija Del Sero samo odmahuje rukom. Zaista tu nije bilo nikakvog kontakta vrednog penala. AU, ŠTA JE SADA URADILA CRVENA ZVEZDA!? Garsija je oduzeo loptu na sredini terena, dodao je Pavkovu, ovaj je dugo čekao da vidi šta da uradi sa loptom, a onda je pokušao da uposli Garsiju na levoj strani... Šteta, ovo je mogla da bude odlična prilika za crveno-bele!
22:04
POČINJE DRUGO POLUVREME! IZMENA U ZVEZDI!
46. MINUT: Izmenu je napravio Vladan Milojević na poluvremenu! Žander je ušao umesto Gobeljića, a Totenhem kreće sa centra u drugih 45 minuta.
21:54
KLADITE SE UŽIVO!
Mi vas, naravno, podsećamo da se putem sajta kladionice Mozzart možete kladiti na utakmicu između Zvezde i Totenhema. Ukoliko verujete u preokret, uhvatićete kvotu 31,31!
21:51
REZULTATI OSTALIH UTAKMICA
Poluvreme je i na preostalim utakmicama koje su počele u 21.00:
 


Atalanta - Mančester siti 0:1


/Sterling 7/

 

Bajer Leverkuzen - Atletiko Madrid 1:0/Tomas 41 ag/

 

Dinamo Zagreb - Šahtjor 1:1/Petković 25 - Patrik 12/

 


PSŽ - Klub Briž 1:0


/Ikardi 22/

 

Real Madrid - Galatasaraj 4:0/Rodrigo 4, 7, Ramos 14p, Benzema 45/

21:49
TOTENHEM VODI, ZVEZDA PROPUSTILA DVE KOLOSALNE ŠANSE!
Nakon prvih 45 minuta fudbala na stadionu "Rajko Mitić" jedino što možemo da konstatujemo je - velika šteta. Jednostavno, Totenhem jeste imao inicijativu, iz nje došao i do gola, ali su velike šanse na drugoj strani promašili Van La Para i Pavkov. Mogla je situacija biti znatno povoljnija za crveno-bele pred nastavak.
21:47
KRAJ PRVOG POLUVREMENA: CRVENA ZVEZDA - TOTENHEM 0:1
45+2. MINUT: Prvi korner za Zvezdu. Nakon čitave zbrke sudija Del Sero svira faul... I to bi bilo to za ovo prvo poluvreme.
21:45
DVA MINUTA NADOKNADE!
45. MINUT: Fojt sada dodaje do Kejna, ali on ne uspeva da prihvati loptu. Dva minuta nadoknade.
21:44
STATIVA, PA PREČKA!!!
44. MINUT: KAKO OVO NIJE GOL!? Nova fantastična šansa za Zvezdu, nalik onoj koju je imao Totenhem... Van La Para pogađa stativu, lopta se odbila do Sančeza koji je umalo postigao autogol, ali je lopta završila na prečki. Šteta, šteta. Moglo je ovo dosta toga da promeni, naročito ako uzmemo u obzir da je sam kraj poluvremena.
21:42
NOVA GREŠKA ZVEZDE NA SREDINI TERENA
43. MINUT: Nova izgubljena lopta Crvene zvezde na polovini terena. Kejn i Dele Ali su krenuli u kontru, a sve se završilo kornerom koji je izborio Son. Srećom, bez veće pretnje nakon udarca iz ugla.
21:40
INICIJATIVA TOTENHEMA
41. MINUT: Kejn je sada u ofsajdu, što je bilo očigledno odmah u začetku napada. Međutim, vrlo brzo lopta ponovo dolazi u posed Totenhema. Ne uspevaju fudbaleri Crvene zvezde nikako da se oslobode pritiska gostiju. Srećom, sve se završava nepreciznim udarcem Lo Selsa.
21:38
MARIN NA ZEMLJI, SREĆOM NIŠTA OZBILJNO
38. MINUT: Marin sada leži na zemlji, ali se nakon ukazane pomoći vratio na teren. Lopta je u posedu Zvezde.
21:33
GOL! LO SELSO!
34. MINUT: Stativa, prečka, odbrana Borjana, ali na kraju ipak gol... Kejn je prvo pogodio stativu, lopta se odbila do Sona koji je potom šutirao, a Borjan je odbranio. Lopta je došla do Kejna koji je šutirao malo traljavo, sve je došlo do Sona, koji je pogodio prečku. Na kraju Lo Selso stavlja tačku na ovaj napad! Kakav napad, neverovatno... Činilo se zaista da će se Zvezda odbraniti.
21:31
NEŠTO MIRNIJI PERIOD...
33. MINUT: Nezgodno su sada defanzivci Totenhema vratili loptu svom golmanu, ali je Gazaniga uspeo da se snađe i pošalje loptu napred. Rouz pravi prekršaj nad Garsijom koji je želeo da krene u kontru, ali sudija Del Sero ovoga puta nije izvadio žuti karton. Sada Zvezda smiruje igru...
21:29
ŽUTI KARTON ZA DAJERA!
30. MINUT: Uf, opasno je sada bilo... Lopta je bila upućena Sonu, ali se Gobeljić snašao i uspeo je da otkloni opasnost. Nakon toga prvi žuti karton, dobija ga Erik Dajer zbog nešto oštrijeg starta. Moraće da bude oprezniji defanzivac Sparsa.
21:28
EVO I KOREOGRAFIJE SA POČETKA MEČA...
Pogledajte kako je izgledala koreografija sa početka utakmice u slikama naših izveštača...
 



 



21:25
BEZ ŠANSE ZA TOTENHEM!
26. MINUT: Faul nad Sonom na levoj strani, pa će Sparsi pokušati da centriraju. Ndombele je izveo slobodan udarac, ali je odbrana Zvezde izbila loptu u korner. Lo Selso šalje loptu na peterac, a Milan Borjan boksuje i ponovo će Zvezda imati loptu.
21:22
KAKVA ŠANSA ZA ZVEZDU! PAVKOV!
23. MINUT: Definitivno najbolja šansa za sada na utakmici. Son se našao na levoj strani, šutirao je po zemlji, ali lopta je završila pored stative. A ONDA, KAKVA ŠANSA ZA ZVEZDU! Pavkov je izbio sam na golmana Totenhema, Gazanigu, ali je šutirao pravo u njega! Pre toga lopta se izodbijala od velikog broja fudbalera domaće ekipe. MALO JE NEDOSTAJALO!
21:20
BEZ VEĆIH ŠANSI ZA OBE EKIPE...
22. MINUT: Nije zadovoljan Maurisio Poketino kako njegov tim igra u ovih uvodnih 20 minuta utakmice. Sada po desnoj strani kombinuju Fojt i Lo Selso, ali lopta dolazi u posed Milana Borjana. Brzo loptu ipak oduzimaju Totenhemovi fudbaleri, ali još jednom ona završava u gol-autu. Za sada bez većih šansi pred oba gola...
21:18
PRVI KORNER TOTENHEMA, ZVEZDA USPEVA DA OČISTI OPASNOST!
19. MINUT: Prvi korner za gostujuću ekipu. Male poteškoće za Borjana, koji je nekako uspeo da boksuje loptu van šesnaesterca, ali ona ostaje u posedu Totenhema. U narednom napadu se okliznuo Borjan, ali na svu sreću ne koriste Sparsi ovu šansu... Zvezda kreće u kontru, koju seče Dele Ali.
21:16
OFSAJD SONA...
17. MINUT: Ofsajd u kojem se sada našao Son... Sudija prvo nije podigao zastavicu, verovatno rukovodeći se onim poznatim pravilom, ali je naknadno ipak odlučio da pokaže da fudbaler Totenhema nije bio u liniji sa defanzivcima domaćih.
21:12
PRVI ŠUT TOTENHEMA KA GOLU!
13. MINUT: Prvi udarac ka golu Crvene zvezde uputio je Hari Kejn. Bila je to veoma teška pozicija iskosa sa desne strane sa nekih desetak metara, Englez je već padao, tako da je lopta završila u gol-autu.
21:10
SPARSI PONOVO NAPADAJU
10. MINUT: Nešto opasniji napad Totenhema na isteku desetog minuta završen je prekršajem. Kejn potom oduzima loptu na sredini terena, ali nakon centaršuta Rouza lopta dolazi u posed crveno-belih. Navijači pritiskaju Sparse svaki put kada je lopta kod njih u posedu.
21:06
SPARSI IPAK SA ČETVORICOM POZADI!
8. MINUT: Zvezda igra veoma visoko i od početka napada pritiska poslednju liniju Totenhema. Ono što je jako važno napomenuti je da Sparsi ipak večeras igraju sa četvoricom pozadi, a ne trojicom, kako je prvobitno bilo najavljeno. Dakle, Dajer se nalazi nazad.
21:03
TOTENHEM PREUZEO INICIJATIVU...
5. MINUT: Fojt je sada tu dosta dugo pritiskao po desnoj strani terena, kombinovao je sa još par igrača, lopta je došla do Kejna, ali su domaći nekako uspeli da raščiste ovu nezgodnu situaciju.
21:01
ENERGIČNO KREĆE ZVEZDA!
2. MINUT: Imao je Garsija šansu da istrči ispred i ostane sam pred Gazanigom već u prvom minutu utakmice, ali su ga defanzivci Totenhema sustigli... Nakon toga je oboren Marin, koji se žalio da je dobio udarac, ali se brzo pridigao, pa će Totenhem krenuti u svoj prvi napad.
21:01
UTAKMICA JE UPRAVO POČELA!
Prvi napad imaće fudbaleri Crvene zvezde!
20:58
IGRAČI SU NA TERENU!
Fudbaleri obe ekipe su izašli na teren predvođeni glavnim arbitrom, Karlosom del Sero Grandeom iz Španije. Igrače je na severnoj tribini našeg najvećeg stadiona dočekala koreografija sa natpisom "Zvezda, le!" Navijači od samog starta glasno pevaju i nadaju se pozitivnom rezultatu Crvene zvezde!
20:55
GOTOVO DA JE PUNO DO VRHA!
Kako se i pretpostavljalo, stadion je ispunjen gotovo do poslednjeg mesta. Preostalo je još par minuta da se i ostala prazna mesta na stadionu ispune... Čeka se početak spektakla!
 



 



20:47
ZAVRŠENE UTAKMICE U MINHENU I MOSKVI...
Rezultati susreta koji su počeli u 18.55:
 


Bajern Minhen - Olimpijakos 2:0 (0:0)


/Levandovski 69, Perišić 89/

 

Lokomotiva Moskva - Juventus 1:2 (1:1)/Mirančuk 12 - Remzi 4, Kosta 90+3/

20:43
STADION SE POLAKO POPUNJAVA
Kako nam javljaju sa lica mesta, očekuje se da će do početka utakmice na stadionu biti oko 44.000 gledalaca... Sve tribine su sasvim dobro popunjene, a najmanje gledalaca se za sada nalazi na zapadu. Evo uostalom kako to izgleda...
 



 



 



20:41
BAJERN POTVRDIO POBEDU!
Bavarci su potvrdili pobedu! Krenula je ekipa Olimpijakosa napred željna da dođe do izjednačenja, a hladan tuš usledio je na drugoj strani terena iz kontre. Spetljali su se fudbaleri gostujuće ekipe u kaznenom prostoru, a na pravom mestu se našao Ivan Perišić koji je povisio na 2:0... To bi bilo to u Nemačkoj.
20:34
VREMENSKI USLOVI POVOLJNI
Kiša je konačno prestala da pada u Beogradu i ne očekuje se da će je biti tokom utakmice. Trenutna temperatura u glavnom gradu Srbije iznosi 13 stepeni, pa su uslovi za igru sasvim zadovoljavajući. Ipak, zbog nešto vlažnijeg terena, moguće je da ćemo gledati bržu igru na obe strane.
20:30
STADION JOŠ UVEK NIJE POPUNJEN DO POSLEDNJEG MESTA
Prema slikama koje smo dobili sa lica mesta, čini se da veliki broj mesta na stadionu još uvek nije popunjen. Ipak, ispred se nalazi određeni broj navijača, pa se očekuje da će situacija biti nešto bolja pred sam početak susreta.
 



 



20:26
EVO ŠTA GOL BAJERNA ZNAČI ZA RASPLET U ZVEZDINOJ GRUPI...
Ukoliko Bajern zadrži prednost i odnese pobedu protiv Olimpijakosa, obezbediće prolazak u nokaut fazu takmičenja. Olimpijakos tako ostaje na poslednjem mestu u grupi sa samo jednim osvojenim bodom protiv Totenhema i protiv Crvene zvezde na domaćem terenu će morati da juri eventualni pozitivan rezultat i produžetak nade za evropsko proleće.



20:19
BAJERN VODI PROTIV OLIMPIJAKOSA!
Mnogo, mnogo dugo smo čekali na gol u Bavarskoj! Odolevao je Olimpijakos čitavih 68 minuta na stadionu Bajerna, a onda je konačno poklekao! Kingsli Koman je probio po desnoj strani terena, a majstorski je na petercu odreagovao Robert Levandovski koji je smestio loptu iza golmana gostujuće ekipe.
 
Ovaj rezultat, naravno, obradovaće i sve navijače Crvene zvezde kojima se tako povećava šansa da prezime u Evropi!
20:14
MILIVOJEVIĆ: TOTENHEM VOLI DA DRŽI LOPTU I DOMINIRA, ZVEZDA ČEKA ŠANSU IZ KONTRI
Luka Milivojević je pred prvu utakmicu Zvezde sa Totenhemom izjavio da Sparsi nekad igraju sa tri, a nekada sa četiri igrača u defanzivnoj liniji. To se lepo pokazalo i večeras, pošto se Poketino odlučio da drži trojicu pozadi.“Nekada igraju sa trojicom, nekada sa četvoricom pozadi. Zavisi šta Poketino odabere. Vole da imaju loptu, da je drže i da dominiraju. Igrao sam protiv njih više puta puta i uvek je bilo tesno osim ovaj poslednji put kad su nas razbili. Mi igramo defanzivno, uvek u dve linije i čekamo šansu iz kontri. Oni su podigli visoko bekove, imali puno igrača na sredini terena i ‘udavili nas’. Lakše nam je bilo kada su ranije igrali sa trojicom u liniji jer su to bili sve neizvesni mečevi”, rekao je tada Milivojević.
20:11
TOTENHEM U FORMACIJI 3-5-2!
Elem, ako je za verovati Uefinom sajtu, Poketino igra u formaciji sa trojicom pozadi. Dakle, Gazaniga na golu, kao trojica štopera Fojt, Sančez i Rouz, po bokovima će operisati Dele Ali i Musa Sisoko, u vezi Ndombele, Dajer i Lo Selso, napred Son i Kejn. Ovo je baš dosta ofanzivno.
20:07
KARTE KOD TAPKAROŠA OD 2.000 DINARA... ZA SEVER BAR 3.000!
Isto tako, naši reporteri javljaju da je ispred stadiona veliki broj tapkaroša koji preprodaju karte za večerašnju utakmicu sa Totenhemom. Tako se karte za istočnu tribinu mogu naći po ceni od 2.000 dinara, za južnu tribinu treba izdvojiti bar 500 dinara više, dok su najskuplje karte sasvim očekivano za severnu tribinu. Ukoliko biste hteli da se nađete sa najvatrenijim pristalicama crveno-belih, morali biste da izdvojite bar 3.000 dinara.
20:04
TOTENHEMOVI NAVIJAČI PRISTIŽU NA STADION
Kako nam javljaju naši reporteri sa lica mesta, policija u duplim autobusima sprovodi pristalice Totenhema na stadion Crvene zvezde. Oni su krenuli sa mesta okupljanja kod stadiona Voždovca i nema sumnje da će uveličati sjajnu atmosferu večeras na stadionu "Rajko Mitić".
20:01
POKETINO IPAK KREĆE SA SONOM...
Što se tiče Totenhema, najveće “iznenađenje“, ako to možemo tako da nazovemo, jeste ime Hjong-min Sona u startnih 11. Nije sporno da je on verovatno i najbolji igrač Totenhema uz Harija Kejna, ali se očekivalo da će početi na klupi pošto ga je vidno potreslo to što je u sudaru sa Evertonom posle njegovog starta Andre Gomeš pretrpeo prelom noge. Son u timu znači i Lukas Moura na klupi, tamo je i Kristijan Eriksen, bled je ove sezone, pa se i očekivala prilika za Đovanija Lo Selsa. Nazad ipak Rouz umesto Bena Dejvisa, Huan Fojt je dobio dobio šansu kao centralni štoper ispred Tobija Aldervajrelda, Tangi Ndombele je ipak tu, iako se očekivalo da i on odmori. Samo da vidimo kako će to sve da posloži Poketino.
19:57
MILOJEVIĆ IZNENADIO FUDBALSKU JAVNOST!
Strateg Crvene zvezde rešio je da promeša sastav za večerašnji meč protiv Totenhema i tako je napravio veliko iznenađenje Maurisiju Poketinu i njegovim fudbalerima. Prvi put će u Ligi šampiona startovati Njegoš Petrović, koji bi mogao da predstavlja možda i najprijatnije iznenađenje večeras na stadionu "Rajko Mitić".
 
Isto tako, u sastav se nakon propuštenog meča u Londonu vraća i Jovančić. Očigledno je Vladan Milojević uvideo da Kanjas nije bio baš idealan izbor u Londonu, a da je isto tako Vulić nešto "mekaniji" za igru koju forsiraju Sparsi.
 

STARTNE POSTAVE:

CRVENA ZVEZDA (4-2-3-1): Borjan - Gobeljić, Milunović, Degenek, Rodić - Jovančić, Petrović - Garsija, Marin, Van La Para - PavkovTOTENHEM (3-5-2): Gazaniga - Fojt, Sančez, Rouz - Dele Ali, Ndombele, Dajer, Lo Selso, Musa Sisoko - Son, Kejn
18:35
POBEDA MLADIH NADA ZVEZDE PROTIV TOTENHEMA!
Pre nego što se bacimo na sastave, valja pomenuti da su ranije danas na stadionu Voždovca u Naselju "Braće Jerković", mladi fudbaleri Crvene zvezde došli do pobede protiv svojih vršnjaka iz Totenhema u okviru Lige šampiona za mlade - 2:0. Oba pogotka viđena su u drugom poluvremenu, a strelci su bili Radulović i Pilipica. Posle ovog trijumfa, crveno-beli nalaze se veoma blizu prolaska u nokaut fazu takmičenja, pošto trenutno zauzimaju drugo mesto u grupi sa tri boda više od Totenhema!
 


Pročitajte opširnije o ovom meču u izveštaju.





18:31
MOZZART KVOTE
Prema kvotama kladionice Mozzart, favorit da dođe do pobede na ovom meču je Totenhem. Kvota na trijumf gostujućih fudbalera iznosi 1,65, dok bi pobeda Zvezde donela prolazak kvote 5,50. U slučaju nerešenog ishoda pišemo prolazak kvote 3,80.
 
Naravno, pored standardne ponude, možete se kladiti i na tačan rezultat, broj pogodaka, da li će oba tima postići gol...
 


21.00: (5,50) Crvena zvezda (3,80) Totenhem (1,65)



Napomena: 
Kvote su podložne promenama!

18:30
DOBRO VEČE!
Poštovani čitaoci Mozzart Sporta, dobro veče! Želimo vam dobrodošlicu na još jedan tekstualni prenos na našem portalu u okviru kojeg ćemo pratiti dešavanja sa utakmice Lige šampiona između Crvene zvezde i Totenhema.
text:
END: Red Star - Tottenham 0: 4
Minute-by-minute follow the events from our largest stadium ...

06 Nov 2019


RED STAR - TOTENHEM 0: 4 / Lo Selso 34, Son 57, 61, Eriksen 85 /


Stadium:
"
Rajko Mitic ", Belgrade

Spectators:
42.381

Judge:
Carlos del Sero Grande (Spain)

RED STAR (4-2-3-1): Borjan - Gobeljic (from the 46th minute Zander), Milunovic, Degenek, Rodic - Jovancic (from the 62nd minute Kanjas), Petrovic - Garcia (from the 67th minute Boaci), Marin , Van La Para - Pavkov. Bench: Popovic, Pankov, Vulic, Boaci, Zander, Simic, Kanjas. Coach: Vladan Milojevic.TOTENHEM (3-5-2): Gazaniga - Foyt, Sanchez, Rose - Dele Ali (from 62 minutes Eriksen), Ndombele, Dyer, Lo Selso (from 86 minutes Skip), Musa Sisoko - Son (from 75th minute Sesenjon), Kane. Bench: Warne, Aldervajreld, Sessenon, Eriksen, Moura, Skip, Davis. Coach: Maurisio Poketino.





Live news
22:57
WELCOME TO THE NEXT VISION!
That would be all of us for tonight, we invite you to read a more extensive report directly from the stadium "Rajko Mitic" by our colleague Aleksandar Gligoric.

Srdjan Todorovic accompanied you to the match, while Darjan Nedeljkovic and Nenad Jovanovic were on the spot alongside Aleksandar Gligoric. Have a nice night, we hope you will stay with us in the evening!
22:55
DESERVED TOTENHEM WIN!
The players of the two teams on the field are growing quite friendly. Too bad, the Star may have come up with a slightly better result, but missed two really big chances in the first half over Pavkov and Van La Para. Tottenham showed much better quality in the second half and deservedly celebrated.
22:54
END OF THE MATCH: RED STAR - TOTENHEM 0: 4
Judge Del Sero Grande plays the end of the match ... Tottenham's convincing victory in Belgrade!
22:53
NO BOARDS LOOK LIKE TO FINISH THE GAME
90 + 4. MINUTE: Boaci went outside to help him, so he might not even finish the game. Now a Star with only nine players on the field.
22:50
SKIP GETS THE YELLOW CARD!
90 + 2. MINUTE: It was a combination of Foyt and Kane, but the ball came to Borjan. Absolutely no excitement on the field in the last five to six minutes. Cessenyon now tried to employ Eriksen in the middle, but none of that. Here's the yellow card for Skip after the start over Boaci. The Red Star footballer is lying on the ground ... It is as if the judge now told the Tottenham football player "what you needed now", at least that could be read from his lips.
22:48
FOUR MINUTES OF COMPENSATION!
90th MINUTE: The game is completely dead after a goal by Eriksen. The question is whether Judge Del Sero Grande will even show what minutes he will make up ... He will, four minutes!
22:46
LAST CHANGE IN THE TOTENHEM TEAM!
86. MINUTE: Maurisio Poketino made the last substitution, Lo Selso came out, and Skip came on the field.
22:44
NEW TOTENHEM GOAL! ERIKSEN!
85th MINUTE: Christian Eriksen now enrolls in the shooters. Again it was Tottenham's fine action, Rose centered around the ground, Eriksen found himself in the heart of the penalty area, kicking, and the ball then bounced off the Red Star defense and tricked Milan Borjan. Spars' convincing leadership ...
22:41
ERIKSEN TOWN ...
82nd MINUTE: Eriksen sent a shot towards the goal of the Star, but Boryan managed to defend that shot! Now Star takes over the ball and tries to keep the pace down because there are fewer players. However, very soon the possession gets into the feet of the visiting team.
22:39
THE STAR WITH THE PLAYER LESS TO THE END, THE SPAVAKES WILL NOT RETURN TO THE FIELD!
80th MINUTE: Milan Pavkov's left ankle is injured and he will not continue the game, so Zvezda will play less with the player in the last ten minutes of this game. They took Milan Pavkov out of the stadium ...
22:35
SPACES ON EARTH!
77th MINUTE: A New Opportunity for Tottenham! The ball came to Giovanni Lo Sels on the edge of the penalty area, and he shot past the right post. The star has now taken over the ball, trying to organize the attack, but Pavkov does not reach the ball. Now Pavkov is on the ground, the problem is that Milojevic has no more changes.
22:34
Get the SON out of the game!
75th MINUTE: Maurisio Poketino makes a change. Son comes out of the game, and Sesenjon is in the game.
22:31
ABOUT 42,000 PEOPLE AT THE GAME!
73. MINUTES: Contrary to forecasts, it has started to rain again in Belgrade, so the terrain is now even more tarnished. Officially, 42,381 people attend the match.
22:30
DANGEROUS, KANE!
71. MINUTE: Uh, again a good chance for Tottenham. Eriksen centered the ground to the right of the field, and Kane kicked a little past the stand. The guests could have easily reached the fourth goal in this match ...
22:26
CHANGE - BOAT INPUTS, GARSIA OUTPUTS!
67th MINUTE: Faul over Marin on the edge of the penalty area and the referee shows it will be a free kick on the left. Marin shoots towards the goal, it will be a corner. Edit, Boaci came in, Garcia came out.
22:24
YELLOW PAPER FOR HIS PETROVIC!
65th MINUTE: Petrovic's sharp start over Rose and referee Del Sero shows a legitimate yellow card.
22:21
CHANGES TO BOTH SIDE!
62. MINUTE: Goal confirmed ... Then changes made on both sides. At Tottenham, Ali left the game and Eriksen came in. Jovančić leaves Kanjas with Zvezda.
22:19
NEW GOAL! SON!
61. MINUTES: Corner for Star, second in the game, brings nothing. Petrović is uncertainly acting on the other side of the field, but luckily the ball somehow reaches Borjan. And then a new goal ... Great Tottenham action, Rose broke through the left side of the field, centered on the ground, the ball came to Son who just dropped the ball into the net! Waiting for VAR decision ...
22:15
GOL! SON!
58th MINUTE: Pavkov lost the ball in the middle of the field and the penalty came on the other side ... Dele Ali added the ball to Son, the Star failed to make a foul early and stop the action, and the South Korean footballer literally punched the net red -white with a powerful blow.
22:13
SPARSI TRYING TO REDUCE THE Rhythm ...
55th MINUTE: Marin and Garcia combined, but nothing came of it. Now Tottenham are trying to lower the pace of the match, combining in the back line.
22:10
THE FIGHT BECAME!
52. MINUTE: The energy of Star comes into this second half vigorously, but on the other hand a great chance for Tottenham. Dele Ali somehow broke through, I almost broke out in front of Borjan, but the Star defense threw the ball into the corner. Lo Selso centers around the corner, boxing Borjan and Zvezda at least briefly eliminates the danger.
22:07
PAVAKS AND GARSIA MISSION!
49th MINUTE: Kane tried to get through the home team defense, he fell, but referee Del Sero just shakes his hand. There really was no contact worth a penalty. AU, WHAT DID THE RED STAR DO NOW !? Garcia seized the ball in midfield, Pavkov added, this one waited a long time to see what to do with the ball, and then tried to put Garcia on the left side ... Too bad this could have been a great opportunity for the red and white !
22:04
SECOND HALF BEGINS! CHANGE IN THE STAR!
46th MINUTE: Made by Vladan Milojevic at half time! Gander came in instead of Gobeljic, with Tottenham moving from the center in the other 45 minutes.
21:54
BET LIVE!
We remind you, of course, that through the Mozzart betting site you can bet on a match between Star and Tottenham. If you believe in a reversal, you will catch the odds of 31.31!
21:51
RESULTS OF OTHER MATCHES
Half time is also on the remaining games which start at 21.00:



Atalanta - Manchester City 0: 1


/ Sterling 7 /



Bayer Leverkusen - Atletico Madrid 1: 0 / Thomas 41 ag /



Dinamo Zagreb - Shakhtar 1: 1 / Petkovic 25 - Patrick 12 /




PSG - Club Brugge 1: 0


/ Ikardi 22 /



Real Madrid - Galatasaray 4: 0 / Rodrigo 4, 7, Ramos 14p, Benzema 45 /

21:49
TOTENHEM LEADS, STAR MISSED TWO COLOSAL CHANCE!
After the first 45 minutes of football at the Rajko Mitic stadium, all we can say is - a great deal of damage. Simply, Tottenham did have the initiative, it came to the goal, but Van La Para and Pavkov missed the big chances on the other side. The situation could have been significantly more favorable for the red and white before proceeding.
21:47
END OF THE FIRST HALF: RED STAR - TOTENHEM 0: 1
45 + 2. MINUTES: First cornerback for the Star. After a whole mess, referee Del Sero plays foul ... And that would have been for this first half.
21:45
TWO MINUTES OF COMPENSATION!
45. MINUTE: Foyt now passes to Kane, but he fails to get the ball. Two minutes of compensation.
21:44
STATIVES, BUT A CROSS !!!
44th MINUTE: HOW IS THIS NOT GOAL !? New fantastic chance for Star, similar to Tottenham's ... Van La Para hits the post, the ball bounced to Sanchez who almost scored the goal but the ball ended up on the crossbar. Too bad, too bad. This could have changed a lot, especially considering the end of halftime.
21:42
NEW MISTAKE OF THE STAR IN THE MIDDLE OF THE TERRITORIES
43rd MINUTE: Red Star's new lost ball halfway through the field. Kane and Dele Ali went the counter, and it all ended with a corner pick from Son. Fortunately, no major threat after a corner kick.
21:40
THE TOTENHEM INITIATIVE
41st MINUTE: Kane is now offside, which was evident immediately at the start of the attack. However, very quickly the ball comes back into Tottenham possession. Red Star football players fail to relieve themselves of the pressure of their guests. Luckily, it all ends with Lo Sels' imprecise punch.
21:38
MARIN ON EARTH, HAPPY IS NOTHING EXCITING
38th MINUTE: Marin is now lying on the ground, but after assisted he returned to the field. The ball is in the possession of the Star.
21:33
GOL! LO SELSO!
34th MINUTE: Tripod, crossbar, defense of Boryan, but in the end still a goal ... Kane first hit a tripod, the ball bounced to Son who then kicked, and Bojan defended. The ball came to Kane kicking a little shaky, it all came to Son, who hit the crossbar. In the end Lo Selso puts a point to this attack! What an attack, incredible ... It really seemed like the Star was going to defend himself.
21:31
SOMETHING SOONER PERIOD ...
33. MINUTE: It was inconvenient for the Tottenham defenders to return the ball to their keeper, but Gazaniga managed to get it right and send the ball forward. Rose made a foul on Garcia who wanted to counter-attack, but referee Del Sero didn't take the yellow card this time. Now the Star is calming the game ...
21:29
YELLOW CARTON FOR DAYER!
30. MINUTE: Ugh, it was dangerous now ... It's a ballwas sent to Son, but Gobeljic managed and managed to eliminate the danger. After that, the first yellow card was given to Erik Dajer for a sharper start. He'll have to be a more cautious Spars defender.
21:28
Here are the choreographies from the beginning of the match ...
See what the choreography looked like from the beginning of the match in the pictures of our reporters ...








21:25
WITHOUT a chance for TOTENHEM!
26th MINUTE: Faul over Son on the left, so the Spars will try to center. Ndombele delivered a free kick but the defense of Zvezda cleared the corner. Lo Selso sends the ball to the fifth, while Milan Borjan box and again Zvezda will have the ball.
21:22
What a chance for a star! PAVKOV!
MINUTE 23: Definitely the best chance of the game so far. Son found himself on the left, kicking the ball down the ground, but the ball ended up next to the post. And then, what a chance for a star! Pavkov broke out on his own to the Tottenham goalkeeper, Gazanig, but he shot straight at him! Before that the ball was bounced off by a lot of home team players. A LITTLE LACK!
21:20
WITHOUT GREAT CHANCE FOR BOTH TEAMS ...
MINUTE 22: Maurisio Poketino is not pleased with how his team plays in these first 20 minutes of the game. Now on the right side is combining Foight and Lo Selso, but the ball comes into the possession of Milan Borjan. The Tottenham football players take away the fast ball, but once again it ends up in the goal-car. So far without much chance of both goals ...
21:18
TOTENHEM'S FIRST CORNER, THE STAR SUCCESSES TO CLEAN THE DANGER!
19th MINUTE: First corner for the away team. Little difficulty for Borjan, who somehow managed to box the ball out of the penalty area, but it remains in Tottenham's possession. In the next attack, Borjan slipped, but fortunately they do not use Sparsi this chance ... The star goes into the counter, cut by Dele Ali.
21:16
OFFSIDE SONA ...
MINUTE 17: Offside that Son now finds himself ... The referee did not raise the flag at first, probably following that well-known rule, but subsequently decided to show that Tottenham's footballer was not in line with the home defenders.
21:12
TOTENHEM'S FIRST Shot To Go Naked!
MINUTE 13: Harry Kane's first shot at the Red Star goal. It was a very difficult position to dodge to the right from some ten meters, the Englishman was already falling, so the ball ended in a goal-car.
21:10
SPARS ARE AGAIN
MINUTE 10: The slightly more dangerous Tottenham attack at the end of the 10th minute ended in a foul. Kane then takes the ball down the middle of the field, but after Rose's midfield, the ball comes in possession of the reds and whites. The fans press the Spars every time the ball is in their possession.
21:06
SPARSI EVEN WITH FOUR BACK!
8th MINUTE: The star plays very high and has been pushing Tottenham's last line since the start of the attack. What is important to note is that the Spars are still playing with four in the back tonight, not three, as originally announced. So Dyer is back.
21:03
TOTENHEM TAKES THE INITIATIVE ...
5th MINUTE: Foyt pressed for a long time on the right side of the field, combined with several other players, the ball came to Kane, but the locals somehow managed to clear this difficult situation.
21:01
THE ENERGY MOVES THE STAR!
MINUTE 2: Garcia had a chance to run in front and stay alone in front of Gazanig in the first minute of the game, but the Tottenham defenders overtook him ... After that, Marin was shot down, who complained that he had got hit but quickly got up. so Tottenham will embark on its first attack.
21:01
THE GAME IS RIGHT TO START!
Red Star football players will have their first attack!
20:58
THE PLAYERS ARE ON THE FIELD!
Footballers from both teams took the field led by the referee, Carlos del Sero Grande of Spain. The players were greeted by choreography on the north stand of our largest stadium with the inscription "Star, le!" Fans have been singing loudly from the start and hoping for a positive Red Star result!
20:55
READY TO BE FULL TO THE TOP!
As expected, the stadium was filled almost to the last place. Only a few minutes left to fill the remaining empty seats in the stadium ... Waiting for the spectacle to begin!








20:47
COMPLETED MATCHES IN MINHEN AND MOSCOW ...
Results of the match which started at 18.55:



Bayern Munich - Olympiacos 2: 0 (0: 0)


/ Levandovski 69, Perisic 89 /



Lokomotiv Moskva - Juventus 1: 2 (1: 1) / Miranchuk 12 - Remzi 4, Costa 90 + 3 /

20:43
The stadium is slowly filling up
As we are told from the scene, it is expected that there will be around 44,000 spectators by the start of the match ... Here's what it looks like ...












20:41
BAJERN CONFIRMED WIN!
Bavarians claim victory! The Olympiakos team went forward eager for a tie and a cold shower followed on the other side of the field. The away team came in from the penalty area, and Ivan Perisic was in the right place, which increased to 2: 0 ... That would be it in Germany.
20:34
WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE
The rain has finally stopped falling in Belgrade and is not expected to be during the game. The current temperature in the Serbian capital is 13 degrees, so the playing conditions are quite satisfactory. However, due to the wetter terrain, it is possible that we will be watching a faster game on both sides.
20:30
THE STADIUM IS STILL NOT FILLED UP TO THE LAST PLACE
According to the pictures we received from the scene, it looks like a lot of the seats in the stadium are not filled yet. However, there are a number of fans in front, so the situation is expected to be slightly better before the start of the match.








20:26
THIS IS WHAT BAJERNA'S GOAL MEANS FOR THE RELEASE IN THE STAR GROUP ...
Should Bayern retain the lead and take the win against Olympiacos, it will provide a pass in the knockout phase of the competition. Olympiacos thus remain in last place in the group with only one point scored against Tottenham and against the Red Star at home will have to chase a possible positive result and an extension of hope for the European spring.



20:19
BAJERN LEADS AGAINST OLYMPICOS!
We've been waiting a long, long time for a goal in Bavaria! He resisted Olympiakos for 68 minutes at Bayern Stadium, then finally knelt! Kingsli Koman made a good effort at breaking through on the right, but the home team's left defense cleared Robert Levandovski to score.

This result, of course, will also rejoice all Red Star fans, which increases the chance of their last name in Europe!
20:14
MILIVOJEVIC: TOTENHEM LOVES TO HOLD THE BALL AND DOMINATE, STAR ARE WAITING A CHANCE FROM CONTR
Luka Milivojevic said before the Stars' first game with Tottenham that the Spars once play with three and sometimes with four players in the defensive line. That turned out to be nice tonight, too, since Poketino decided to keep three in the back. ”Sometimes they play with three, sometimes with four in the back. It depends on what Poketino chooses. They like to have the ball, hold it and dominate it. I played against them multiple times and it was always tight except this last time they broke us. We play defensively, always in two lines and waiting for a chance from the counter. They raised high backs, had a lot of players in the middle of the field and 'drowned us'. It was easier for us when they played with three in the line earlier because they were all uncertain matches, "Milivojevic said at the time.
20:11
TOTENHEM IN FORMATION 3-5-2!
Well, if UEFA's site is to be trusted, Poketino plays in formation with three in the back. So Gazaniga on goal, as the three stoppers Foyt, Sanchez and Rose, will operate on the flanks of Dele Ali and Musa Sisoko, regarding Ndombele, Dyer and Lo Selso, forward Son and Kane. This is quite offensive.
20:07
CARDS WITH TAPKAROSH OF 2,000 RSD ... FOR NORTH BAR 3,000!
Also, our reporters report that there are a large number of upholsterers in front of the stadium reselling tickets for tonight's game with Tottenham. Thus, tickets for the Eastern grandstand can be found at the price of 2,000 dinars, at least 500 dinars should be set aside for the southern grandstand, while the most expensive tickets are quite expected for the northern grandstand. If you would like to meet the most passionate supporters of red and white, you would have to spend at least 3,000 dinars.
20:04
TOTENHEM FANS ARRIVE TO THE STADION
As our reporters tell us from the scene, the police are escorting Tottenham supporters to Red Star Stadium in double buses. They left the gathering place at Vozdovac Stadium and there is no doubt that they will create a great atmosphere tonight at Rajko Mitic Stadium.
20:01
POKETINO BEGINS TO GO WITH SON ...
As for Tottenham, the biggest "surprise", if we may call it that, is Hyun-min Son's name in the starting 11. It is not disputed that he is probably Tottenham's best player alongside Harry Kane, but he was expected to start on the bench since he was visibly shaken by the fact that in the collision with Everton, after his start, Andre Gomes had suffered a leg fracture. Son on the team means Lukas Moura on the bench as well as Christian Eriksen, pale this season, so the opportunity for Giovanni Lo Sels was expected. Back after Rose instead of Ben Davis, Juan Foyt was given a chance as a center fielder in front of Tobi Aldervireld, Tangi Ndombele was still there, though he was also expected to rest. Let's just see how this will set Poketino apart.
19:57
MILOJEVIC SURPRISES THE FOOTBALL PUBLIC!
The Red Star strategist has decided to mix the squad for tonight's match against Tottenham, and it has come as a big surprise to Mauritius Poketin and his football players. For the first time in the Champions League, Njegos Petrovic will start, which could be perhaps the most pleasant surprise tonight at Rajko Mitic Stadium.

Also, after the missed match in London, Jovančić returns. Obviously, Vladan Milojevic realized that Kanjas was not an ideal choice in London, and that Vulic was a bit "softer" for the Spars forcing game.


STARTING POSTS:

RED STAR (4-2-3-1): Borjan - Gobeljic, Milunovic, Degenek, Rodic - Jovancic, Petrovic - Garcia, Marin, Van La Para - PavkovTOTENHEM (3-5-2): Gazaniga - Foyt, Sanchez, Rose - Dele Ali, Ndombele, Dyer, Lo Selso, Musa Sisoko - Son, Kane
18:35
WIN OF YOUNG HOPES STARS AGAINST TOTENHEM!
Before we get into the lineups, it should be mentioned that earlier dat the Vozdovac stadium in the "Brace Jerkovic" neighborhood, young Red Star players came to victory against their peers from Tottenham within the Youth Champions League - 2-0. Both hits were seen in the second half and the scorers were Radulovic and Pilipica. After this triumph, the red and whites are very close to passing the knockout phase of the competition, as they are currently ranked second in the group with three points more than Tottenham!



Read more about this match in the report.





18:31
MOZZART QUOTES
According to Mozzart betting odds, the favorite to win this match is Tottenham. The away odds for away football players are 1.65, while winning the Star would bring the odds to 5.50. In the case of a draw, we write a passing odds of 3.80.

Of course, in addition to the standard offer, you can also bet on the correct score, the number of hits, whether both teams will score a goal ...



9pm: (5.50) Red Star (3.80) Tottenham (1.65)



Note:
Odds are subject to change!

18:30
GOOD EVENING!
Dear Mozzart Sport readers, Good evening! We would like to welcome you to another text transmission on our portal in which we will follow the events of the Champions League match between Red Star and Tottenham.
